pageProduct.name: Redwin Body Lotion with Vitamin E and EPO 400ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Moisturiser formulated for sensitive skin to assist in preventing the visible irritations associated with dry and/or sensitive skin.

What is Redwin Body Lotion with Vitamin E and EPO for?Enriched with vitamin e and evening primrose oil, this luxurious cream will leave your skin looking and feeling hydrated, revitalised and healthy. The unique formula has been specially developed for sensitive skin to assist in preventing the visible irritations associated with dry and/or sensitive skin.Who is Redwin Body Lotion with Vitamin E and EPO for?Specifically developed for sensitive skin but suitable for all skin types.When should I use Redwin Body Lotion with Vitamin E and EPO?Use twice daily for maximum results, particularly after showering or exposure to wind or sun or after washing hands.Why should I use Redwin Body Lotion with Vitamin E and EPO?It is one of our best value-for-money creams.

Suitable For: Suitable for the whole family.

Size: 400ml

Serving Size: n/a

Warnings

For external use only. Keep away from eyes.

Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Mineral Oil, Glyceryl Stearate, Cetyl Alcohol, Stearic Acid, propylene Glycol, Dimethicone, Triethanolamine, Lanolin Alcohol, Oleyl Alcohol, Carbomer, Fragrance, Tritcum, Vulgare (Wheat) Germ Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Methylparaben, Ethyparaben, Butylparaven, Propylparaben, Isobutylparaben, Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Oil, Tetrasodium EDTA, Linalool.Suitable for a halal diet,

Contains: n/a

Allergen Contains: Null

Allergen May Be Present: Null

Allergen Free From: n/a

Directions

For soft & smooth skin, apply twice daily; for very dry skin keep re-applying. Suitable for all over body.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 30°C

Storage Temperature: 30°C
